Text:
Arg, sorry guys, just finished fully watching it and the audio towards the end is still a little off in places even after I repacked the original MKV and re-encoded it a second time. :( There is also a commercial in it still. 

Still no proper for the 720p though, so I guess it's the best we will get this time around.
Sweet, a 720p Proper came out! :) Proper re-encode coming soon.
